item.title: Major Scale Reference Chart - Music Theory Cheat Sheet Design
item.description: This music theory cheat sheet shows the notes and major, minor and diminished diatonic triads for the 12 major scales in the order of circle of fifths: C, G, D, A, E, B, Gb, Db, Ab, Eb, Bb, F. Knowing the major scale and what diatonic chords go with it
